summary: this is a simple wav replacer that eliminates the annoying trash can banging noise that gets played everytime you get a critical
descriptionHtml:
NO MORE CRITICAL  \"CLUNK!\" NOISE
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/932262-1343696851.jpg[/img]

this has drove me nuts since the first time I played, everytime I get a critical hit I get this awful

\"CLUNK!\" 

I used the vanilla sound file and simply turned it down in \"Audacity\" so you cant hear it

theres a read me in the download, just drop the sound folder in Data and thats it
if you decide later you miss the banging trash can noise, just delete it
author: Dogtown1
